description:
This 3-section aluminum pole rocks backcountry specific features ideal for splitboarders. It packs small to easily tuck away when it's time to descend, plus it fits in your suitcase when you're riding slopes far from home.

  • Ergonomically shaped dual-density plastic grip has ridges to help maintain grip
  • Secondary grip position allows you to move your hand down when side-hilling
  • Removable strap is shaped for comfort
  • Quickflick utility tab on handle works great to raise and lower your heel lifts
  • Eyelet allows you to attach and dry gloves or rig a guyline for a tarp
  • Burly forged aluminum locking mechanism is also simple to use
  • Carbide tips grip well on ice and rock
  • Includes all-mountain baskets. (85mm)
name: G3 Pivot 3 Piece Pole
